title: Classic Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk in milk and egg. Stir in melted butter. Cook on griddle until golden.

title: Simple Tomato Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in oil, add tomatoes, simmer. Toss with pasta and serve.

title: Waffles
instructions: Mix the ingredients together. Cook in a greased waffle iron until golden brown. Enjoy!

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread. Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon. Spread on toast and serve.

title: Quick Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add chicken and curry, add tomatoes and simmer until cooked. Serve with rice.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars, add eggs, mix dry ingredients, fold in chips. Scoop and bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

title: Hearty Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables, add lentils and broth, simmer until tender. Season to taste.

title: Grilled Cheese
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden.

title: Simple Salad
instructions: Toss ingredients and dress with oil and salt.
